name: Stranded (itch)
description:
This was made for the Global Game Jam 2018. The theme was "Transmission", and I made this little thing in two days at KTH in Stockholm.

The original game jam release, along with full source code for the game including the game engine, can be found at the global game jam site: 
 https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/stranded
